document_name: Drainage and Flood Control Ordinance (Establishment of Drainage Authorities), 1960
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ISR/1960/ISR-1960-12-25-Drainage and Flood Control Ordinance (Establishment of Drainage Authorities), 1960_b53a402251bfde303adb1da9b6935e9d.pdf
document_description: The Drainage and Flood Control Ordinance of 1960 makes provisions for the establishment and management of drainage authorities for the areas listed in Annex 1. The Ordinance contains 62 articles, divided into 6 Chapters: Preliminary (1), Authority Members (2), Administration (3), Committees (4), employees (5) and Various Orders (6). Note: As the previous one, I included it because of the hazards, though it doesn't specifically mention climate change, might be out of scope. Also, the text is in Hebrew and the google translation didn't make much sense, we will need to get a proper translation in order to analyse.
